attributes.action: Keep the Sheffield Eagles in Sheffield!
attributes.additional_details:
We the supporters of this petition call upon Sheffield City Council to scrap their plans on the demolition of the Don Valley Stadium in Sheffield.
The Don Valley Stadium has been the Home Ground for the Sheffield Eagles RLFC for 22 years. Earlier this year Sheffield City Council decided to demolish the ground as it is 'Not Used Enough'.
If the ground is demolished, the Eagles will be forced to leave Sheffield and find a Home Ground somewhere else. This will take away Sheffield's Rugby League pride and thousands of fans will have to leave the city to see their team play. THIS MUST NOT HAPPEN!

Please sign this petition and help keep the Sheffield Eagles in Sheffield!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the City Council, and not something the Government can intervene in.   Perhaps lobby your MP?
